name: js-x509-utils
description: Universal Module of X.509 Certificate Utilities in JavaScript

scripts.test:bundle: npm run webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=bundle npm run test
scripts.karma:bundle: npm run webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=bundle karma start
scripts.karma:window: npm run webpack && cross-env TEST_ENV=window karma start
scripts.html: npm run webpack && npm run html:source && npm run html:bundle && npm run html:window
scripts.html:source: cross-env TEST_ENV=source NODE_ENV=html npm run webpack
scripts.html:bundle: cross-env TEST_ENV=bundle NODE_ENV=html npm run webpack
scripts.html:window: cross-env TEST_ENV=window NODE_ENV=html npm run webpack
scripts.analyze: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --optimize-minimize --json --config webpack.prod.js | webpack-bundle-size-analyzer
scripts.build: rm -rf ./dist && npm run babel && npm run webpack:prod

author: Jun Kurihara
